entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sachigo Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 26. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 8. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 24. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
